name: The Journey of a Vehicule: The Movie: The Game
name_original: The Journey of a Vehicule: The Movie: The Game
description:
Summary

It's the story of a young fan (me) who wants to create a "fan-game" of his favourite movie, which is inspired from a video game (like Street Fighter: The Movie: The Game). So he decides of an assignment to pay a tribute to this movie (which I created a false trailer) with a Unity game, instead of Phaser. And we are discovering as the story goes on why he had to make the game with Unity3D.
